original_text: Eat nothing that has yeast in it. Whatever country you live in, you must eat bread without yeast in it.’
korean_text: 너희는 아무 유교물이든지 먹지 말고 너희 모든 유하는 곳에서 무교병을 먹을지니라

sentences.original_text: Eat nothing that has yeast in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 누룩이 든 것은 아무것도 먹지 말라.

sentences.original_text: you must eat bread without yeast in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 누룩 없는 빵을 먹어야 한다.
